title: 服务器连接不上
author: -妖妖灵-
txt_content:
加入服务器提示o.netty.channel.rbstr aotChannelsinnotatedSocketException: Network is unreachable: no further information:
刚搭的服还没进过

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 防火墙关了吗，端口正确

replies.author: -妖妖灵-
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-16 19:52
防火墙关了吗，端口正确
默认25565 防火墙两边都关了啊用的阿里云的云服linux系统阿里云25565接口也开了
